data.title: Age is no bar for Reshmi Ghosh
data.meta_description: Honestly, after working for 17 years in the industry, the age of the character is no priority. In fact, I don’t even mind playing a grandmother if the role is substantial
data.text:
Ghulam Ali arrives in Kolkata

Pakistani ghazal legend Ghulam Ali arrived in the city on Monday, a day ahead of his scheduled performance here.

Ghulam Ali arrives in Kolkata

'Wazir' mints Rs.21.01 crore in opening weekend

Director Bejoy Nambiar's drama thriller "Wazir", starring Amitabh Bachchan and Farhan Akhtar, has collected over Rs.20 crore in its opening week.

'Wazir' mints Rs.21.01 crore in opening weekend

Rajkumar Hirani wants to show 'Saala Khadoos' to sportspersons

Filmmaker Rajkumar Hirani, one of the producers of upcoming sports drama "Saala Khadoos", intends to show the film to some distinguished personalities in sports to get their feedback.

Rajkumar Hirani wants to show 'Saala Khadoos' to sportspersons

Sukumar Helped Me Discover The Actor Within: Rakul Preet Singh

Rakul Preet Singh, who worked with filmmaker Sukumar in the forthcoming Telugu release "Nannaku Prematho", said the experience helped her discover the actor within and perform beyond her own expectations.

Sukumar Helped Me Discover The Actor Within: Rakul Preet Singh

Hrithik Roshan Treats Fans With Birthday Selfie, Tinsel Town Wishes 'Greater Glory'

Overwhelmed by all the love showered on him on his 42nd birthday on Sunday, actor Hrithik Roshan said he cherishes all the affection. He also came up with a way to return some of the joy through a "birthday happy selfie".

Hrithik Roshan Treats Fans With Birthday Selfie, Tinsel Town Wishes 'Greater Glory'
